title: Sara Ali Khan gives us a new way to wear smoky eyes
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sara Ali Khan (@saraalikhan95) on Sep 25, 2019 at 11:48am PDT

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Adrian Jacobs (@adrianjacobsofficial) on Sep 25, 2019 at 10:39am PDT

Do you love smoky eye makeup, but sometimes struggle with it being too messy? Sara Ali Khan took the smoky eye look to the next level, as she kept her eye-makeup clean yet diffused. It looks absolutely stunning and makes for a perfect way to add a luxurious appeal to any ensemble. If you want to know how to achieve this level of versatility with your smoky eye makeup, follow this easy decode.Here's how you can get the look:1. Cleanse, tone, and moisturise your skin.2. Apply a lip balm to your lips.3. Dab on a face primer.4. Blend a hydrating foundation onto your face and neck.5. Conceal blemishes with a concealer.6. Use an eyebrow pencil to fill in your brows and blend it in with a spoolie brush.7. Apply a liquid highlighter to the high points of your face like cheekbones, temples, brow bones, Cupid’s bow, and bridge of your nose.8. For the eyes, first apply an eyeshadow primer on your eyelids to hold your bold eyeshadow in plac .9. Next, apply a dark brown eyeshadow into the crease of your lids and blend.10. Use a black eyeshadow pigment to pack your lids with colour. Do not extend outside of your eyelids.11. Use brown gel eyeliner to finely define your waterline and extend a small wing on the outer corners.12. Apply a generous amount of lengthening mascara to the upper and lower lashes.13. Apply an apricot blush to the apples of your cheeks.14. Drench your lips in a pearlescent pink lip gloss.15. Set the look with a spritz of makeup setting spray.
description: Sara Ali Khan takes her beauty look to next level by flaunting clean smoky eyes. We help you get the look.
